description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nGolden Aura:
After your {RACE_Exotic} creatures are killed, your other {RACE_Exotic} creatures gain their trait. Your {RACE_Exotic} creatures have 10% more stats (other than {STAT_health}) for each extra trait they have. This trait does not stack.
name: Constellation of Huanglong
